description_it: Insalata nordica con filetti di aringa affumicata, patate, mele e una salsa cremosa allo yogurt ed erba cipollina.
description_en: Nordic-style salad with smoked herring fillets, potatoes, apples, and a creamy chive yogurt sauce.

ingredients.notes_it: filetti, messi in ammollo nel latte

steps.instruction_it: Preparare in anticipo le aringhe: tagliare i filetti a striscioline e metterli in ammollo nel latte per diverse ore o tutta la notte.
steps.instruction_en: Prepare the herring in advance: cut fillets into strips and soak in milk for several hours or overnight.

steps.instruction_it: Affettare finemente la cipolla e metterla in ammollo in acqua e aceto per diverse ore, cambiando l'acqua un paio di volte.
steps.instruction_en: Thinly slice the onion and soak in water and vinegar for several hours, changing the water a couple of times.

steps.instruction_it: Lessare le patate fino a renderle morbide ma non sfatte. Pelarle e tagliarle a cubetti.
steps.instruction_en: Boil the potatoes until tender but not mushy. Peel and cut into cubes.

steps.instruction_it: Sbucciare le mele e ridurle a cubetti piccoli. Scolare i filetti di aringa e asciugarli.
steps.instruction_en: Peel the apples and cut into small cubes. Drain the herring fillets and pat dry.

steps.instruction_it: Preparare la salsa: unire yogurt greco, erba cipollina tritata, succo di limone e olio. Emulsionare.
steps.instruction_en: Prepare the sauce: combine Greek yogurt, chopped chives, lemon juice and oil. Emulsify.

steps.instruction_it: Comporre l'insalata: unire patate, aringa, cipolle e mele. Condire con la crema, sale e pepe. Servire.
steps.instruction_en: Assemble the salad: combine potatoes, herring, onions and apples. Dress with the cream, salt and pepper. Serve.
